item.title: Analyzing Messi vs. Ronaldo with the FIFA API + jq + curl
item.description: Who is the world's greatest footballer, Messi or Ronaldo? EA Sports surely has calculated the answer to this question in their player ratings. They rate peak Crisitiano Ronaldo, Lionel Messi and Luka Modrić at 99 overall, with Neymar and Lewandowski at 98. Anecdotally, Messi has won 7 Ballon d'Or, the …
item.dc:creator: pythonmarketer
